history.proof: unfold ex_lim. exists x. srun best use: is_lim_id.

exceptions.exn: No such bound variable l (no bound variables at all in the expression).

original: unfold ex_lim. exists x. apply is_lim' with (l := x). intros eps. exists (pos eps). unfold Rbar_locally'. intros y Hy. rewrite Rabs_right. apply Hy.
